title: THOUGHT / WORLD REPUBLIC
description: Rhetoric talks about Communism --The World Republic.

links.title: You: "Look around."
links.text: Look around.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Psst, hey, you!"
links.text: Psst, hey, you!

links.title: You: "Who -- me?"
links.text: Who -- me?

links.title: Rhetoric: "Yes, you. Word on the street is you..."
links.text: Yes, you. Word on the street is you're ready to start building *communism* again!

links.title: You: "'Again'?"
links.text: 'Again'?

links.title: Rhetoric: "Yes -- you're ready to start buildi..."
links.text: Yes -- you're ready to start building communism *again*. You've built it before, *they've* built it before. Hasn't really worked out yet, but neither has *love* -- should we just stop building love, too?

links.title: You: "Can't argue with that."
links.text: Can't argue with that.

links.title: Rhetoric: "So, what about all that communism y..."
links.text: So, what about all that communism you've promised to build? Word on the street is you've woken up from a thousand years of slumber, promising to erect a version of communism many times greater than any attempted before. Is that true?

links.title: You: "Yes, we should all stop building lo..."
links.text: Yes, we should all stop building love.

links.title: Rhetoric: "This conversation isn't really abou..."
links.text: This conversation isn't really about love. Try to keep up, okay? This is about the communism you've *promised* to build. Word on the street is it's going to be ten thousand times larger than any communism previously attempted. Is that true?

links.title: You: "Love has worked out really well for..."
links.text: Love has worked out really well for me. I'm a love winner.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Good. We need tender men like you b..."
links.text: Good. We need tender men like you building gargantuan communism. Word on the street is it's going to be ten thousand times larger than any communism previously attempted by human beings. Is that right?

links.title: You: "How come there's *word on the stree..."
links.text: How come there's *word on the street*?

links.title: Rhetoric: "You keep saying things like *down w..."
links.text: You keep saying things like *down with the bourgeoisie*, *eat the rich*, *sodomize the land-owners*, *impale all people who have more than 25 reál in their pocket*, *literally murder all human beings regardless of their political beliefs* -- that kind of stuff.

links.title: You: "Oh, right. That sounds like me."
links.text: Oh, right. That sounds like me.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Funky-style. Very funky. So tell me..."
links.text: Funky-style. Very funky. So tell me. Do you have any questions before we fire up the Big Communism Builder, or do we get right down to it?

links.title: You: "Wait, first -- what's this *communi..."
links.text: Wait, first -- what's this *communism* even about?

links.title: Rhetoric: "Failure. It's about failure."
links.text: Failure. It's about failure.

links.title: You: "Failure?"
links.text: Failure?

links.title: Rhetoric: "Yes! Abject failure. Total, irrever..."
links.text: Yes! Abject failure. Total, irreversible defeat on all fronts! Absolutely vanquished, beaten, curb-stomped and pissed on -- until *you* came along! *You* will reverse the fortune of the workers of the world.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You alone, against every living thi..."
links.text: You alone, against every living thing, against every human alive: eight hundred trillion reál in the hands of an *impossibly* well organized ruling class; towering city blocks of bank-men who have the ears of prime ministers; million-headed armies of nations and the love of your own mother!

links.title: Rhetoric: "You -- against the atom, the charm..."
links.text: You -- against the atom, the charm and the spin. Where the whole world failed -- matter failed to bend to human will; human will failed to get out of bed and tie its laces -- you alone, single-handedly, will rebuild the dreams of the working class. You are The Last Communist.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Now get to work, comrade."
links.text: Now get to work, comrade.

links.title: You: "I don't *do* failure."
links.text: I don't *do* failure.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Of course you do! You *are* failure..."
links.text: Of course you do! You *are* failure, you *are* Communism. Absolutely vanquished, beaten, curb-stomped, shat on. While everyone else is out partying, having a callous laugh, *you* will reverse the fortune of the workers of the world.

links.title: You: "Roll up your sleeves and start buil..."
links.text: Roll up your sleeves and start building Communism. (Opt in.)

links.title: Rhetoric: "Oh yeah! Get the firing squads and..."
links.text: Oh yeah! Get the firing squads and the animal wagons ready!

links.title: You: "Wait, what? Firing squads? You didn..."
links.text: Wait, what? Firing squads? You didn't say anything about those.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Too late to back out now. You can't..."
links.text: Too late to back out now. You can't make an omelet without breaking a few million eggs!

links.title: You: "Roll your sleeves up further and br..."
links.text: Roll your sleeves up further and breathe in the pristine air. [Finish thought.]

links.title: You: "It's too tiring. I don't have it in..."
links.text: It's too tiring. I don't have it in me. I'm beat down and broken. (Opt out.)

links.title: Rhetoric: "Very well. I guess no one will buil..."
links.text: Very well. I guess no one will build Communism then. Tell the working man it's over. Unless anyone has... objections?

links.title: Logic: "No objections. It's mathematically..."
links.text: No objections. It's mathematically impossible to achieve a classless society. Everyone knows this.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Let not failure ensnare you any fur..."
links.text: Let not failure ensnare you any further, beautiful pixie girl! Be an acrobat! A prancing faerie queen!

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Did someone mention cocaine? Are we..."
links.text: Did someone mention cocaine? Are we doing cocaine? No? I'm sure I heard someone say Cocainimism...

links.title: Rhetoric: "Anyone? Anyone else? There's no one..."
links.text: Anyone? Anyone else? There's no one?

links.title: Volition: "There's one."
links.text: There's one.

links.title: You: "What should I do?"
links.text: What should I do?

links.title: Volition: "You should build Communism -- preci..."
links.text: You should build Communism -- precisely *because* it's impossible.

links.title: You: "No. Shut up. I want to lie down and..."
links.text: No. Shut up. I want to lie down and let the water carry me downstream. [Discard thought.]

links.title: Rhetoric: "There's no one. Okay then. Lie down..."
links.text: There's no one. Okay then. Lie down and let the water carry you downstream...

links.title: You: "Good bye, Communism. [Finish though..."
links.text: Good bye, Communism. [Finish thought.]

links.title: You: "I haven't said anything like that."
links.text: I haven't said anything like that.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Okay, not in so many words. But don..."
links.text: Okay, not in so many words. But don't deny it. You're about to rip off that mask of social democracy and reveal the monstrous seven-eyed lamb of global communism that will devour and masticate mankind.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Everyone can see that. So tell me,..."
links.text: Everyone can see that. So tell me, do you have any questions before we fire up the Big Communism Builder, or do we get *right down to it*?

links.title: You: "I've said *some* mildly left wing t..."
links.text: I've said *some* mildly left wing things but none of those.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Oh yes, the *mask of ambivalence*...."
links.text: Oh yes, the *mask of ambivalence*. Don't deny it. You're about to rip it off and reveal the monstrous seven-eyed lamb of global communism that will devour and masticate mankind.

links.title: You: "Get the fuck outta here! No. [Finis..."
links.text: Get the fuck outta here! No. [Finish thought.]
